body: Hi guys I wouldn't know what Section this would be in so I just put it in The Avicus Lounge.This post Is about :Have you seen any retired players from Avicus on a different server and yesterday I was playing an a kit PvP Server and Im sure I saw TheTNTDude. I forgot now because there were so many names I was teamed with him I cant remember so have you seen any retired players of Avicus on another Server?
